Text:
One of the best vamp films I've seen! Definitely worth watching.

HolyRoses, if its possible could you do The Vampire Diaries for Ipod? I know the season hasn't finished yet, but I'm dying to see it and I know your a reliable uploader. :)
Haven't had a chance to watch the entire movie yet, but so far the quality is *excellent*.  Thank you SO very much!
